version_description:
Minor bug fixes.

For feedback or questions about the functionality of the app, please contact us at mobile.apps@canadapost.ca

Minor bug fixes.

For feedback or questions about the functionality of the app, please contact us at mobile.apps@canadapost.ca
Bug fixes to address issues with tracking
Bug fixes to address issues with tracking

• Improvements to push notifications make it easier for you to turn them on and understand the delivery status of your parcels.
• Enhancements make it easier for you to track your parcels.
• Track enhancements identify duty and taxes owed and Collect on Delivery amount due for sender (COD), when applicable.
• Improvements to FlexDelivery make it easier for you to use the service.
• Minor bug fixes.

For feedback or questions about the functionality of the app, please contact us at mobile.apps@canadapost.ca

• Minor bug fixes.

For feedback or questions about the functionality of the app, please contact us at mobile.apps@canadapost.ca

• A new feature enables you to select a delivery preference for your items, in case you’re unavailable when we deliver.
• Track enhancements make it easier for you to track your items.
• Minor bug fixes.

For feedback or questions about the functionality of the app, please contact us at mobile.apps@canadapost.ca

• A new feature syncs tracked items with iCloud for easy access on all your Apple devices.
• An improvement to FlexDelivery enables you to remain signed in when you close the app.

• Track enhancements make it easier for you to track your items.

• Minor bug fixes.
